faq.title: Common
faq.description: Quick answers to questions you might have.

pricing.question: How much does a typical project cost?
pricing.answer: Consulting starts at €500. Full platforms typically range from €5,000–€25,000 depending on scope. We provide a detailed quote after understanding your needs.

tools.question: What technologies do you work with?
tools.answer: Our primary stack is Next.js, React, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL. We also work with Supabase, Prisma, and various APIs. We pick the right tool for the job.

timeline.question: How long does a project take?
timeline.answer: A consulting engagement takes 1-2 weeks. A typical web application takes 4-12 weeks depending on complexity. We provide realistic timelines upfront—no surprises.

remote.question: Do you work with clients outside France?
remote.answer: Yes. We work remotely with clients across Europe and beyond. Communication happens via video calls, email, and your preferred project management tools. Fully bilingual in English and French.

support.question: Do you offer ongoing support after launch?
support.answer: Yes. We offer maintenance packages that include bug fixes, updates, monitoring, and feature additions. Most clients choose ongoing support—we don't disappear after delivery.

cta.title: Ready to build something real?
cta.description: Let's talk about your project. Free consultation, no pressure. We'll discuss your goals and see if we're a good fit.
cta.note: Typically respond within 24 hours • EN/FR bilingual

metadata.title: About — Independent Engineering Practice
metadata.description: Deralis Digital is an independent engineering practice building real web platforms — SaaS applications, dashboards, automation workflows, and SQL-powered databases.

hero.title: About
hero.description: We build real web systems — platforms, dashboards, automation.

intro.paragraph1: Deralis Digital is an independent engineering practice focused on building real web platforms — not simple websites. We design and develop systems: SaaS applications, dashboards, automation workflows, and SQL-powered databases using modern technologies such as Next.js, React, TypeScript, Supabase, and Prisma.
intro.paragraph2: Our approach is engineering-first, built around clarity, performance, and long-term reliability. No WordPress. No templates. No drag-and-drop. Only real software.

philosophy.title: Our philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: Modern businesses don't need pages — they need systems.
systems: Integrate with existing tools and APIs
philosophy.conclusion: We build platforms that replace spreadsheets, manual processes, and outdated workflows with modern, stable, maintainable architecture.

whatWeBuild.note: Each platform we build is designed around clean engineering, not templates or pre-made components.

howWeWork.title: How we work
howWeWork.description: Clients work directly with the engineer behind Deralis Digital — without layers, outsourcing, or miscommunication. The process is simple and technical:

step1.title: Technical Discovery
step1.description: Understanding your system, workflows, and constraints.

step2.title: Architecture Design
step2.description: Database schema, API structure, core flows, security, scalability.

step3.title: Development
step3.description: Full-stack implementation using Next.js, React, TypeScript, Supabase.

step4.title: Testing & Deployment
step4.description: Staging, QA, production deployment, environment setup.

step5.title: Long-term Support
step5.description: Feature updates, monitoring, improvements, and scaling.

howWeWork.note: This workflow ensures stable delivery and reduces time-to-production.
